title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Autonomous AI agents you can truly trust (AIM234)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 您可以真正信任的自主 AI 代理 (AIM234)
abstract: Learn how to power accurate and trusted agents at scale with AI-ready data and governance. This presentation is brought to you by IBM, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 了解如何利用 AI 就绪数据和治理来大规模支持准确可信的智能体。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 IBM 为您呈现。
